articles.title: Bluefin tuna sells for record $3.2 million at year-opening auction at Tokyo fish market - AP News
articles.description: A 535-pound bluefin tuna sold for a record 510 million yen ($3.2 million) at the first auction of 2026 at Tokyo’s Toyosu fish market. The top bidder for the prized tuna at the predawn auction on Monday was Kiyomura Corp., whose owner Kiyoshi Kimura runs the p…

articles.title: US Strike on Venezuela Puts Bitcoin in Focus as Oil Slides - Decrypt
articles.description: The U.S. capture of Venezuela’s President Nicolás Maduro sent oil to four-year lows, while crypto markets have held steady.
